metadata.description: Shim to return VerificationModel logic name in metadata when overridden so that it does not get reverted on template update

parameters.description: one or more files, with parameter keys prefixed by `file` (Ex: `file0`, `file1`...). File type must be one of our [supported MIME types](http://developer.sheerid.com/asset-mime-types/).
parameters.name: file

parameters.description: a valid asset token obtained from [Issue Token](#!/Asset/issueToken)
parameters.name: token

parameters.description: to merge multiple documents into one when possible
parameters.name: mergeMultipleDocuments

parameters.description: the type of document the user is uploading
parameters.name: assetType

parameters.description: free form text to provide additional details of assetType
parameters.name: assetTypeDescription

parameters.description: A URL to which the request will be redirected upon a successful upload.  If omitted, will not redirect upon success.
parameters.name: success

parameters.description: A URL to which the request will be redirected upon a failed upload.  If omitted, will not redirect upon failure.
parameters.name: failure

post.description: Issue a token to facilitate an Asset upload via [Upload](#!/Asset/upload).

parameters.description: the identifier of the request to which the Assets will be attached
parameters.name: requestId

parameters.description: time (in milliseconds) before the token expires (default: 1 day)
parameters.name: lifespan

get.description:
Obtain a map of required fields for the specified VerificationTypes.
 If multiple VerificationTypes are specified the list is the union of the individual results.

200.description: A map from AffiliationType to a list of required field objects

get.description: Obtain a map of required fields for the specified Verification Template

200.description: A map from AffiliationType to a list of required field objects

post.description:
**Perform a verification.** This is the primary method of importance for most integrations.
 Fields to supply vary based on the affiliations the caller is interested in verifying and the type of verification being performed.  For a list of which fields are relevant for a particular type of request, see the [verification field requirements documentation](http://developer.sheerid.com/docs/fields.html).

parameters.description: An email address, preferably the one issued by the organization being verified
parameters.name: EMAIL

parameters.description: Given name of the verification subject
parameters.name: FIRST_NAME

parameters.description: Surname/family name of the verification subject
parameters.name: LAST_NAME

parameters.description: Complete birth date of the verification subject
parameters.name: BIRTH_DATE

parameters.description: The date on which the affiliation being verified began. For VETERAN, this is the date of discharge/end of active duty status.
parameters.name: STATUS_START_DATE

parameters.description: an optional organization id, see [List Organizations](?url=swagger-all.json#!/Organization/listOrganizations)
parameters.name: organizationId

parameters.description: an organization name supplied when the ID is not known. If `organizationId` is supplied, this parameter is ignored.
parameters.name: organizationName

parameters.description: an organization type (see [List Organization Types](?url=swagger-all.json#!/OrganizationType/listOrganizationTypes)) to help when matching the organization name.  If `organizationId` is supplied or `organizationName` is not supplied, this parameter is ignored.
parameters.name: organizationType

parameters.description: `false` to disable matching of organizationName. If `organizationId` is supplied or `organizationName` is not supplied, this parameter is ignored.
parameters.name: matchName

parameters.description: A comma-delimited list of affiliation type names (see [List Affiliation Types](?url=swagger-all.json#!/AffiliationType/listAffiliationTypes)). Defines the affiliations the requestor deems acceptable for a given verification. (For example, when attempting to verify that an individual is either a full-time or part-time student: `_affiliationTypes=STUDENT_FULL_TIME,STUDENT_PART_TIME`
parameters.name: _affiliationTypes

parameters.description: A comma-delimited list of verification type names (see [List Verification Types](?url=swagger-all.json#!/VerificationType/listVerificationTypes)). Defines the requestor's list of acceptable techniques that may be used to verify an individual.
parameters.name: _verificationTypes

parameters.description: A comma-delimited list of asset type names (see [List Asset Types](?url=swagger-all.json#!/AssetType/listAssetTypes)). Defines the requestor's list of acceptable documents for use with `ASSET_REVIEW` verification types.  If `ASSET_REVIEW` is not an allowable verification type, this configuration is ignored.
parameters.name: _assetTypes

parameters.description: A comma-delimited list of Reward IDs (see [List Rewards](?url=swagger-all.json#!/Reward/listRewards)). Defines any rewards to be issued when an individual is verified.
parameters.name: _rewardIds

parameters.description: metadata value for the supplied key (ex: `:orderId=179365`)
parameters.name: _metadata key (any string prefixed with `:`)_

parameters.description: the identifier of an existing template (see [Create Template](?url=swagger-all.json#!/Template/createTemplate)) from which to source verification request configuration. If this value is supplied, any other request configuration directives (parameters prefixed with `_`) are ignored.
parameters.name: templateId

parameters.description: a custom identifier for tracking a unique end-user as recognized by a client system
parameters.name: endUserId

parameters.description: the end-user's IP address, may be supplied in situations where the API is invoked by an intermediate server
parameters.name: endUserIp

get.description: Check the status of a historical verification.

parameters.description: the identifier returned with the original request
parameters.name: requestId

post.description:
Update and re-submit an existing verification request.
 The previous response to this request must have a result of `null`, otherwise update is disallowed. Only identity data can be changed (parameter names as described by [List Fields](?url=swagger-all.json#!/Field/listFields)). Organization id/name or other configuration supplied with the original request is not modifiable.

parameters.description: the identifier returned with the original request
parameters.name: requestId

parameters.description: An email address, preferably the one issued by the organization being verified
parameters.name: EMAIL

parameters.description: Given name of the verification subject
parameters.name: FIRST_NAME

parameters.description: Surname/family name of the verification subject
parameters.name: LAST_NAME

parameters.description: Complete birth date of the verification subject
parameters.name: BIRTH_DATE

parameters.description: The date on which the affiliation being verified began. For VETERAN, this is the date of discharge/end of active duty status.
parameters.name: STATUS_START_DATE
